androidx.recyclerview.widget

接口 RecyclerView.LayoutManager.LayoutPrefetchRegistry

  • 封闭类:
    RecyclerView.LayoutManager

    public static interface RecyclerView.LayoutManager.LayoutPrefetchRegistry
    Interface for LayoutManagers to request items to be prefetched, based on position, with specified distance from viewport, which indicates priority.
    另请参阅:
    LayoutManager#collectAdjacentPrefetchPositions(int, int, State, LayoutPrefetchRegistry), RecyclerView.LayoutManager.collectInitialPrefetchPositions(int, LayoutPrefetchRegistry)

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addPosition(int layoutPosition, int pixelDistance)
      Requests an an item to be prefetched, based on position, with a specified distance, indicating priority.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addPosition

        void addPosition(int layoutPosition,
                 int pixelDistance)
        Requests an an item to be prefetched, based on position, with a specified distance, indicating priority.
        参数:
        layoutPosition - Position of the item to prefetch.
        pixelDistance - Distance from the current viewport to the bounds of the item, must be non-negative.
